description: A small bill covered in odd symbols.  Tearing it will in turn cause a small dimensional tear located within a nearby entity.  Despite only lasting a few milliseconds, an internal tear in reality should be enough to kill anything.  Hopefully.

The greatest sandwich that will ever be made, in this universe and the next.  A quadruple stacker with beer-batter fried poultry, caramel chocolate chili, and topped with a specially made sauce of egg, blue cheese, honey mustard, BBQ and extremely concentrated vinegar that oozes down the other layers, before the entire thing is pressed and grilled in a waffle iron and finished with a garnish of gold and silver flakes and a fresh fruit skewered on top.  All the gourmet chefs in existence could not even conceive such a combination which, by all means, should not taste this good - But you did it.  And you don't plan on sharing.
//: ever order one of those overpriced sandwiches at a restaurant? Strange density intended.

description: A watery liquid that holds a truly dangerous amount of hydration.  Nothing hydrates like forcing your body to generate water!  Nothing hydrates like ThirstTrouncer!
Oxyjelly made to cause a big burst of oxygen, helping against asthma and smoke inhalation.
Oxyjelly made to slowly provide oxygen over a long timespan, allowing the user to breathe underwater.

//: The name is intended as an acronym that spells a word for coffee.  The resulting word can be from any language.
description: Tired of sleeping?  This serving of Coffee-Adjacent Fluidified Energizer is just the thing you need to go from exhausted to not even tired.  It won't help with sleep deprivation and contains almost enough caffeine to cause a heart attack on its own, but who cares?  It's good coffee, it's strong coffee, and that all what matters.

A homemade general purpose reality implosion device.  Use this item to pull the pin and start the fuse.  After 5 seconds, everything nearby will be violently sliced, warped, aged, and partially teleported straight into many different sections of the nether.  After a short moment of instant death, the dimensional gap will probably heal.  Probably.

use_action.msg: You pull the pin on the grenade.

description: This netherium warp grenade is active, and will explode any second now.  Continue holding it to die in the messiest and most violent of ways imaginable

use_action.message: You've already pulled the %s's pin, try throwing it instead.
use_action.name: Pull pin
